Posted By: TheEtheriumMaster (6/21/2011 1:23:47 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Heh, I had one of my best wins ever with this card. My friend had me down to 1 life, and he had 15. I had played two other spells previously, but he had countered them both. So, as a last ditch effort, I pulled Ignite Memories. He had one card in his hand, and it just so happened that it was 5 CMC. That, combined with Storm and the two other spells I had played, destroyed him in one fell swoop. He was furious and I literally danced around like a moron xD
posts.html:
Heh, I had one of my best wins ever with this card. My friend had me down to 1 life, and he had 15. I had played two other spells previously, but he had countered them both. posts.post_content:
normally storm card effects are supposed to be basically crap, except that crap x1000000 storm copies is actually pure gold. this card however, is solid WITHOUT storm, thanks to the Eldrazi filling up every Timmy's boxes and binders and decks.
  
   
I wonder which feels worse- being hit with this on Emrakul, or Gleemax? tell you what Timmy, I'll let you play with Type 4 rules if you let me play as many of this card as I want. let's see what happens. :)
  
   
when this copies, does it only copy the damage or also the revealing a card? i.e.- can you make your opponent One With Nothing on top of taking damage to the face?
